title: Etherian Javelin Thrower
summaries: The Etherian Javelin Thrower is an enemy that spawns during the Old One's Army event. It attacks by throwing javelins at its target from a distance that will pierce through the player.
The Etherian Javelin Thrower requires 200 kills to be awarded completion of its corresponding <linked>banner</linked>, as opposed to the usual 50 kills.

statistics.Banner: [img:Etherian Javelin Thrower Banner]Etherian Javelin Thrower Banner(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions)
